thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Kimberley

author: Kimberley
title: Kimberley
text:
I recently received my Vintage Ladies Lite bike (I chose it in black), and I just love it!
It arrived (to Tasmania) really fast and was very well packed. The bike looks great, it's light and easy to ride (gears change smoothly etc), and at the price you really can't beat it. I bought a small sized bike, as I'm only 164cm/5"4 tall. The only thing I feel is that if I were much shorter, the bike would be a bit big. Overall, it's a fabulous product and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Reid Cycles.
